column3: Latest;Keo Seima Wildlife Sanctuary covers an area of ​​nearly 300
column4: 000 hectares and four local communes in Mondulkiri Province. The sanctuary has high potential for developing natural tourism projects.------Keo Seima Wildlife Sanctuary is home to more than 60 species of wildlife and plants on the critically endangered list.------https://cambo-fresh.com/archives/6569?fbclid=IwAR0VtjjMQWEb6g3aRTATolrx3xgU2ORA1_om6DJ5Kh-tkYjAmP2_iDYJbrw
